deploy.startCommand: bash -c 'echo "$(date) - Starting deploy..." && until php artisan migrate:status >/dev/null 2>&1; do echo "$(date) - Waiting for DB..."; sleep 2; done && php artisan migrate:fresh --seed --force && echo "$(date) - Migration and seeding done" && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT'
